```{r}

# going to try to make a dot density plot and make it polar

dot_density_1 <- chase_data %>% 
  filter(Enneagram != "NA") %>% 
  filter(Extroverted == "Extroverted") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Enneagram)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_polar()
```
